menu-text: What can I do for you?
claim-rewards: Wow speedy, you're a fast learner! Here are your rewards for this quest.
connect-your-wallet: Once you get your RadQuest Hero Badge, you’ll unlock these other options:

notifications.title: Attenzione!
notifications.logged-in-with-wallet: I see you've logged in with your wallet!
notifications.received-clams: You're ready to continue your quest: Transfer Tokens.
notifications.basic-quests-complete: Now continue your journey with the Advanced Quests.
notifications.join-friend: You're now ready to join {{ referrer }} and claim your XRD reward!
notifications.new-tier: You just leveled up with more friends! Now go claim your rewards.
notifications.swap-completed: Continue your quest: Swap Tokens on a DEX.
notifications.stake-completed: Continue your quest: Radix Network Staking.
notifications.instapass-badge-received: Continue your quest: Get Verified with Instapass.
notifications.thorswap-swap-completed: Continue your quest: Bridge Tokens with THORSwap

fuse-elements.intro1: Using my Web3 powers, I can fuse 5 Elements into a RadGem. Who knows what color or material it will be!
fuse-elements.intro2: It looks like you have {{count}} Element(s) in your registered Radix account.
fuse-elements.enough-elements: Give me 5 Elements and I’ll get started with fusing them into 1 RadGem...
fuse-elements.not-enough-elements: Oops! You currently only have {{count}} Element(s) in your registered Radix Account.
fuse-elements.no-elements: You don't have any Elements in your wallet. Get at least 5 Elements by completing quests, and then come back!
fuse-elements.radgem-claimed: You can find your new RadGem with the NFTs in your registered Account in your Radix Wallet.
fuse-elements.multiple-radgems: You have multiple RadGems ready to be claimed.
fuse-elements.send-elements-subtitle: Elements will be sent to Jetty via your Radix Wallet

create-radmorphs.intro: Using the power of a Morph Energy Card, I can combine 2 RadGems into 1 beautiful and unique RadMorph!
create-radmorphs.intro2: The colors, materials, and quality of the Card and RadGems you choose will decide what your RadMorph looks like, as well as its ultimate quality.
create-radmorphs.intro3-success: To get started, you’ll choose 1 Card and 2 RadGems and see a preview of what the resulting RadMorph will be...
create-radmorphs.intro3-fail: Oops! You only have {{radgems}} RadGem(s) and {{energyCards}} Morph Energy Card(s) right now.
create-radmorphs.radmorph-preview-text: Ready to create this RadMorph? Continue to give Jetty the Card and RadGems, and receive back the RadMorph.
create-radmorphs.resources-sent-from-wallet: Card and gems will be sent from your Radix Wallet
create-radmorphs.radmorph-created:
You can now find your RadMorph under NFTs in your registered Radix Account.
Treasure it – or trade it with friends if you like!
create-radmorphs.open-gift-box-subtitles: Gift Box will be sent to Jetty via your Radix Wallet

open-gift-box.no-boxes: Sorry, you don’t have any Gift Boxes in your registered Radix Account to open right now.
open-gift-box.one-box-title: Let's see what's in your {{giftBox}} Gift Box!
open-gift-box.multiple-boxes-title: Pick a Gift Box to open
open-gift-box.claimed: You can now find the contents of your Gift Box in your Account in your Radix Wallet.
